Reset goals: The sub-goals are:

def has_dvd_player(remote:item):
    # Function to check if the remote control is for the DVD player
    symbol has_dvd=exists dvd: item : is_dvd_player(dvd) and close(remote, dvd)
    return has_dvd

behavior turn_on_dvd(dvd:item, remote:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(dvd) # Turn on the DVD player

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and has_dvd_player(remote)
        # Select the remote control associated with the DVD player

        bind dvd: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd) and close(dvd, remote)
        # Select the DVD player that is close to the remote
        
        turn_on_dvd(dvd, remote)
        # Use the remote to turn on the DVD player

Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['Turn on the DVD player with the remote control.']

def has_remote_control_features(item:item):
    # Determine if the item has remote control features
    symbol remote_features=exists rc: item : is_remote_control(rc) and close(rc, item)
    return remote_features

def is_powered(item:item):
    # Check if the item is on
    symbol powered=has_switch(item) and is_on(item)
    return powered

behavior turn_on_device_with_remote(player:item, remote:item):
    body:
        assert has_remote_control_features(player)
        assert has_switch(player)
        if not is_powered(player):
            achieve is_on(player)
        # If player is not already on, turn on the player using the remote

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(player)
        # Select the DVD player
        
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and close(remote, player)
        # Select the remote control close to the DVD player
        
        turn_on_device_with_remote(player, remote)

mote_control, dvd_player)

behavior turn_on_dvd_player(dvd_player:item):

behavior __goal__():
